g.text: Track throughput, accuracy, latency, and language coverage in real time.
Next: OCR screen (word boxes + confidence) → TSV → Translation
Extract structured text with bounding boxes + confidence. Perfect for invoices, labels, and PDFs.
Next: TSV tab (word coordinates) → Translate tab (EN→ES)
Every word becomes a record (coords + confidence) — enabling overlays, search, and audit trails.
Why it matters: token-level structure enables searchable PDFs, overlays, audit logs, and high-confidence exports.
Convert extracted text to any target language while preserving structure and key fields (amounts, IDs).
Point the app at local Docker, on-prem servers, or isolated networks. Health checks validate readiness.
• Fast document understanding (OCR + layout) • Translation for global operations • Structured export for auditing and automation
• Runs offline/on-prem • Clear service status • Repeatable pipeline with measurable confidence
Looping demo: Dashboard → OCR → TSV → Translate → Settings
